isis.stitle: CAB: 5000i AND 9000i CONVENTIONAL - REMOVE - Remove CAB DOOR LATCH ASSEMBLY

svcproc.title: Remove CAB DOOR LATCH ASSEMBLY
svcproc.para: If removing DRIVER SIDE CAB DOOR LATCH ASSEMBLY follow Steps 1, 2 and 3 below to gain access to inside of door.

step1.para:
Remove driver side cab door lower trim panel from cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Remove Driver Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.

Remove driver side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly from cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Remove Driver Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.
Once driver side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly is removed, place it on a padded work surface and continue with Step 7 below.

svcproc.para: If removing PASSENGER SIDE CAB DOOR LATCH ASSEMBLY follow Steps 4, 5 and 6 below to gain access to inside of door.

step1.para:
Remove passenger side cab door lower trim panel from cab door. Refer to
CAB DOOR LOWER TRIM PANEL
, Remove Passenger Side Cab Door Lower Trim Panel.

Remove passenger side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly from cab door. Refer to
UPPER DOOR TRIM/INNER DOOR PANEL AND WINDOW REGULATOR ASSEMBLY
, Remove Passenger Side Upper Door Trim/Inner Door Panel and Window Regulator Assembly.
Once passenger side upper door trim/inner door panel and window regulator assembly is removed, place it on a padded work surface and continue with Step 7 below.

svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 75 for Items in parentheses.

caution.para: To prevent damage to the door while fully open, reinstall the door check strap.

step1.para: Slide retaining clip (Item 1) off inner cab door handle control rod (Item 2) and remove inner cab door handle control rod from cab door latch assembly (Item 3), driver side shown.
Slide retaining clip (Item 4) off door lock button control rod (Item 5) and remove door lock button control rod from cab door latch assembly (Item 3), driver side shown.
Slide retaining clip (Item 6) off outer cab door handle control rod (Item 7) and remove outer cab door handle control rod from cab door latch assembly (Item 3), driver side shown.
Slide retaining clip (Item 8) off door key lock control rod (Item 9) and remove door key lock control rod from cab door latch assembly (Item 3), driver side shown.

figure.caption: Figure 75. Driver Side Cab Door Latch Control Rods

calloutgroup.callout1: 2. INNER CAB DOOR HANDLE CONTROL ROD
7. OUTER CAB DOOR HANDLE CONTROL ROD

svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 76 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Remove four mounting screws (Item 1) securing the inside and outside cab door latch assemblies (Item 2) to cab door, driver side shown.

figure.caption: Figure 76. Driver Side Cab Door Latch Screws
